about_the_game:
Join the exciting adventure of a character who survived the zombie apocalypse with an action-packed game called "Run For Exodus". In a radio broadcast, you learn about the existence of the Exodus, a salvation ship for survivors. Your character embarks on a journey full of dangers to reach the ship.

You will need to use your skills to avoid zombie attacks, fight and survive. It will be important to overcome the obstacles you encounter during your journey, clear the areas full of zombies and keep in touch and keep up to date with the current situation.

Using the courage and skills of your character, you will overcome difficult challenges and struggle to achieve your goal.

"Run For Exodus" will take you to an immersive story and suspense-filled action. Move towards a new hope in this world full of struggle for survival. Fight against the zombie apocalypse to complete your journey and reach the salvation ship.

In addition, you can do shooting drills by choosing different modes in the game, fight zombies and enjoy the game mechanics.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore,

detailed_description:
Join the exciting adventure of a character who survived the zombie apocalypse with an action-packed game called "Run For Exodus". In a radio broadcast, you learn about the existence of the Exodus, a salvation ship for survivors. Your character embarks on a journey full of dangers to reach the ship.

You will need to use your skills to avoid zombie attacks, fight and survive. It will be important to overcome the obstacles you encounter during your journey, clear the areas full of zombies and keep in touch and keep up to date with the current situation.

Using the courage and skills of your character, you will overcome difficult challenges and struggle to achieve your goal.

"Run For Exodus" will take you to an immersive story and suspense-filled action. Move towards a new hope in this world full of struggle for survival. Fight against the zombie apocalypse to complete your journey and reach the salvation ship.

In addition, you can do shooting drills by choosing different modes in the game, fight zombies and enjoy the game mechanics.
name: Run For Exodus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 10700K equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Standing or Room Scale
  • Additional Notes: VR Headset required, 2x USB 3.0 ports

short_description: You find yourself in a zombie apocalypse in our RUN FOR EXODUS game specially designed for VR. Alone, wield weapons with real-life moves and explore a post-apocalyptic world in virtual reality. Get rid of these dead with the quests.
